comments:
DS (8/7/01 10:44:34 AM)
	I was in the Java perspective and had closed the task list.
	I had then selected the name of a type in a Java editor and hit F4.

	Unsure if this is a ui or jdt problem.

4 org.eclipse.ui 0 Widget is disposed

NOTES:

Could not reproduce it and could not find anything in the 2.0 stream code that 
could cause this problem.
*** Bug 46790 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
